name: Coloring Ball
description:
Just sit back relax and play with coloring ball to color wash the platforms earn points and progres through levels.

Easy to learn but difficult to master coloring ball combines the classic platforming game twists and game designs to a one touch to play casual platformer game.

How to play:

Ball jumps on its own and splats paint to platforms it touches to and paints. You gain points as you paint the platform and try to reach the end of level. Just tap on screen to move forward. That's it.

Inreased difficulty level as you beat the levels.

Have fun with this colorful coloring ball game. Enjoy!
